derivation: or מָקֹם; also (feminine) מְקוֹמָה; or מְקֹמָה; from H6965 (קוּם);
strongs_def: properly, a standing, i.e. a spot; but used widely of a locality (general or specific); also (figuratively) of a condition (of body or mind)
kjv_def: country, [idiom] home, [idiom] open, place, room, space, [idiom] whither(-soever).
